Key Match Events: India won the T20 World Cup final against South Africa with a score of 176-7
South Africa's Heinrich Klaasen scored 147 runs in 15 overs
Marco Jansen scored only 2 runs before being dismissed by Jasprit Bumrah
David Miller scored 21 runs in 17 balls but was dismissed in the last over by Suryakumar Yadav
Pre-Game Insights: India's Virat Kohli announced this would be his last T20 World Cup appearance
Rohit Sharma, Indiaâ€™s team captain, emphasized the team's resilience and determination
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed pride in the team's performance and achievement
Virat Kohli highlighted the team's success and the importance of the next generation taking over
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was South Africa's first time playing in the final of an international cricket competition
Jasprit Bumrah received the title 'Player of the Tournament'
